starless.name: Riley drowning
starless.description: a digital painting of Riley experiencing a nightmare of drowning

starless.name: riley meditating
starless.description: a drawing of Riley learning to use magic, which they channel by meditating to music

starless.name: Riley after battle
starless.description: a digital drawing of Riley a little beat up after fighting a monster

starless.name: Riley and Leah
starless.description: a close crop of Riley and Leah laying down together

starless.name: Riley and Leah
starless.description: Riley and Leah laying down together

starless.name: Riley and Leah at Pride 2020
starless.description: a digital drawing of Riley and Leah at Pride, Leah has a lesbian flag and a pride flag tank top. Riley has a nonbinary bandana.

starless.name: Riley gets a sword!
starless.description: a doodle i did in my session notes when Riley first got their sword

dreamscape.name: an iconic duo
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe hugging, really displaying how much smaller Ashe is

dreamscape.name: walkthing through static
dreamscape.description: an early painting of Aster walking through the dreamscape

dreamscape.name: Aster at the beach house
dreamscape.description: a digital drawing of Aster in their bathing suit, enjoying the beginning of summer vacation before things go horribly wrong

dreamscape.name: Ashe concept art
dreamscape.description: some initial drawings of Ashe to get a better feel for drawing them

dreamscape.name: twins?
dreamscape.description: a quick sketch of a moment in one of the sessions where Amy is pulled into the dreamscape and meets Andie for the first time

dreamscape.name: fancy twins
dreamscape.description: Aster and Andie dressed up for a formal event, looking sharp as ever

dreamscape.name: San Diego summertime
dreamscape.description: a scene from childhood, young Aster and Andie running with a kite

dreamscape.name: separated, but close
dreamscape.description: an older drawing of Aster and Andie reaching towards portals in their respective dimensions

dreamscape.name: twins through time
dreamscape.description: three drawings of Aster and Andie as they grew, first as kids, then as teens, right before Andie falls through the portal, then as adults where they are now in the story

dreamscape.name: Aster and Ashe in a different style
dreamscape.description: a style experiment with Aster and Ashe

dreamscape.name: through the nightmares
dreamscape.description: Ashe comforting Aster after one of their terrible nightmares

dreamscape.name: Aster & Ashe doodles
dreamscape.description: a sketch page of Aster and Ashe moments. visiting the local indie bookstore, reading with their cats, and trying on each other's clothes

dreamscape.name: Ashe needs a haircut
dreamscape.description: a soft moment in the daily lives of Aster and Ashe, where Aster shaves the back of Ashe's head while they sit in the bathtub

dreamscape.name: Aster is too tall
dreamscape.description: Ashe tries (and succeeds, mostly) in giving Aster a piggy back ride

dreamscape.name: matching sweaters
dreamscape.description: a cuddly Aster and Ashe wearing matching sweaters in their respective colors

dreamscape.name: wedding day
dreamscape.description: inspired by a picture from Molly Ostertag and Noelle Stevenson's wedding. Ashe feeding Aster some frosting from their wedding cake on their (eventual) wedding day. Aster has flowers in their hair in the colors of some of the most people in their life (and also pansexual pride colors!). Ashe has a cape and that's beautiful.

dreamscape.name: wintertime adventures
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe all bundled up for the cold Chicago winter. inspired by a scene from the Happiest Season trailer. Aster is wearing the handmade scarf that Ashe gave them for their birthday

dreamscape.name: christmas card
dreamscape.description: a drawing of Aster and Ashe's Christmas card from 2020. here's the flavor text: 'Merry Christmas from Aster, Ashe, Kepler (small and grey), and Carl (large and orange)! It’s been a long year. Ashe graduated, Aster survived lots of TA-ing, and both Kepler and Carl were rescued. There was lots of late night studying and plenty of coffee to go around. Despite some rough patches and a few injuries, we’re looking forward to a happy, healthy 2021!'

dreamscape.name: Aster is a dad
dreamscape.description: inspired by a joke that Amy has accidentally called Aster dad. Aster in cargo shorts, high socks, and wearing earbuds. Ashe is terribly embarrassed by their idiot.

dreamscape.name: sketch page
dreamscape.description: a sketch page, featuring a tender moment of Aster and Ashe coexisting on their bed before going to sleep for the night, Ashe bestowing a forehead kiss to Aster, and Andie and Aster posing for a birthday photo in the dreamscape. this was their first birthday together in over a decade, but it was bittersweet, since Andie couldn't come back to the real world with them.

dreamscape.name: Aster fashion show
dreamscape.description: an early drawing of Aster in some nice fashion from Pinterest, before i decided they have very little sense of fashion and wear the same shirt every day.

dreamscape.name: Aster outfit reel
dreamscape.description: Aster in a couple of outfits/variations of outfits. never quite finished this, but the idea is there

dreamscape.name: the Chung family
dreamscape.description: Aster, Andie, and their mom and dad. a family photo after Andie is reunited with her parents.

dreamscape.name: Aster, Amy, and Alan on Christmas
dreamscape.description: a picture of Aster, Amy, and Alan celebrating Christmas together

dreamscape.name: the gang's all here
dreamscape.description: well, not quite. the core 6 of raid party. team bonk'n'conk, as we call them. from L to R, Karina, Alan, Amy, Aster, Ashe, and Gary.

dreamscape.name: got you flowers (with words left unsaid)
dreamscape.description: an emotional piece, placed outside of canon, where Aster has upset Ashe and returns after a fight to give them flowers and apologize. this was a super experimental piece and i'm really happy with how it turned out

dreamscape.name: sleepy heads
dreamscape.description: Aster and Ashe, fallen asleep on the floor during a evening hangout with Andie and Rachel. they do this more than they should.
